primary_trope.name: extreme_logistics
primary_trope.hook_text: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Logistics. Trans Am Bike Race is one.
primary_trope.mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) — knowing a perfect score exists but not why triggers dopamine anticipation.

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: We gave Trans Am Bike Race the verdict: The Coast-to-Coast Ultimate. The Icons tier. 90 out of 100. Let me tell you what that really means.
beats.text_on_screen: Trans Am Bike Race: The Coast-to-Coast Ultimate
beats.visual: Verdict badge slam + tier badge + avatar

broll_sources.query: Astoria, Oregon to Yorktown, Virginia drone
Astoria, Oregon to Yorktown, Virginia landscape

beats.editing_note: Open with verdict like a boxing title card. Avatar with villain energy. Music: ominous build. PROMISE the viewer they'll learn the real story.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap + cognitive dissonance (verdict vs expectation).

beats.label: WHAT THEY TELL YOU
beats.narration: Here's the pitch. What the website wants you to believe.
beats.visual: Marketing highlights overlay — strengths as bullet points

broll_sources.query: Trans Am Bike Race official trailer
Trans Am Bike Race promo video

beats.editing_note: Read strengths in an exaggerated 'promotional voice.' Avatar side-eyes camera. Bright, clean visuals — this is the 'too good to be true' section. CONTRAST PATTERN: this calm section sets up the burst at 0:50.

strengths: The longest bike race distance on earth—4,200+ miles coast to coast
Complete American experience: 10 states, Pacific to Atlantic, every landscape
Rich trail angel culture and 50 years of TransAmerica Trail heritage
Accessible technically (90% paved) while remaining extreme in demands

beats.label: WHAT THEY DON'T TELL YOU
beats.narration: Now the stuff that doesn't make the brochure.
beats.visual: Red flag overlay — weaknesses with warning icons

broll_sources.query: Trans Am Bike Race course preview
gravel cycling Primarily paved roads following the historic TransAmerica Bicycle Trail

beats.editing_note: BURST SEQUENCE at 0:50 transition (pattern interrupt). 5-10 quick cuts: meme reaction, avatar facepalm, red overlay flash, warning sound. Then settle into analysis. Each weakness gets its own visual card + avatar reaction.

weaknesses: 30-50% DNF rate reflects genuine brutality—2-5 weeks of continuous effort
Kansas wind and mental monotony has broken countless strong cyclists
Logistics for finish-to-start return travel are complex (coast to coast)
Sleep deprivation over 2-5 weeks compounds all physical challenges

beats.label: THE NUMBERS DON'T LIE
beats.narration: And the scores that tell the real story.
beats.visual: Score cards — lowest 3 dimensions with explanations
beats.editing_note: RE-ENGAGEMENT BEAT — this is the ~2 min mark. Start with the least bad score, escalate to worst. Each score reveal: brief silence (0.5s), then number slams in. Avatar reaction scales with how bad the score is. Von Restorff: visually isolate the worst score (different color, bigger text, longer hold).

beats.label: THE BOTTOM LINE
beats.narration: If you dream of cycling across America under your own power, Trans Am is the definitive way to do it. But respect what 4.2 thousand self-supported miles actually means.
beats.editing_note: PAYOFF. Close the open loop from the hook. Avatar delivers final take directly to camera. End ABRUPTLY — never signal 'we're wrapping up.' MrBeast rule: cut to CTA mid-energy.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown. All 14 dimensions. Free prep kit. Link in bio.
beats.editing_note: Keep energy up. Don't wind down.
beats.engagement_question: Roast or defend Trans Am Bike Race. Go.
